headline: Will FTC Settlement Pause for Express Scripts Reshape Cigna Group’s (CI) PBM-Driven Investment Narrative?
summary: Earlier this week, the Federal Trade Commission paused its administrative case against major pharmacy benefit managers, including Cigna’s Express Scripts and Evernorth Health, staying proceedings and discovery deadlines until July 1 to allow for potential settlement talks. This pause marks a critical moment for Cigna’s pharmacy benefit management operations, as any negotiated outcome could reshape how it competes and contracts across the prescription drug supply chain. We’ll now examine how...
